title: Shipwreck Secrets
overview: Scattered across the world, over 3 million shipwrecks line the floors of our oceans, seas, and lakes. Most are waiting to be discovered, have their stories told and their secrets revealed. In this new 6 x 60' series, Shipwreck Secrets joins teams of explorers, investigators, and maritime experts from across the globe as they discover, identify and uncover the truth about some of the most fascinating wrecks on earth. From ships believed lost to the curse of the Bermuda Triangle, to the largest naval battle in history, this series uses cutting edge underwater technology to gather the clues and piece the evidence together and lay to rest the mysteries of the deep.
